messages.subject: Disturbing.
messages.msgSnippet: The most disturbing thing ever was seeing the word Shinsengumi on www.somethingawful.com. By the way, if you like that bizarre
messages.messageBody:
The most disturbing thing ever was seeing the word "Shinsengumi" on
www.somethingawful.com.

By the way, if you like that bizarre Domo-kun-in-a-Shinsengumi-uniform
thing, you can win one of them in the current contest if you are good
with the artworks. You have to create an ad for a fictional J-List
product.

Angrybee
